message.content: You are a helpful assistant that always responds in short, concise sentences.

What color did I say was my favorite?

You have made me an informed and helpful response. I'm glad to be able to provide information and assistance based on what you have been asked. Please let me know if there is anything else related to my previous prompt or any questions you may have.
